name: Zulu Five Oscar
description:
An explosive, interactive, submersive experience! Blast your friends away with torpedoes and give them that sinking feeling when you drive your submarine victoriously through their wreckage.

Battle against your opponents in an underwater fight to the death; will you rise the victor or be food for the fishes?

Features two to four player local multiplayer submarine combat, fire torpedoes and release mines to destroy your opponents.
